attributes.action: Ban the private sale of fireworks
attributes.additional_details: Anyone can walk into a shop, by fireworks and use them carelessly. The impact on pets is horrific with some left shell-shocked or worse. Organised displays held away from residential areas can help to alleviate this.
attributes.background: Stop the sale of fireworks for private use, limiting fireworks to organised displays. It has a detrimental impact on domestic animals, wildlife, and those with PTSD. They are used as people like without consideration for others, often in urban settings, leading to accidents and fatalities.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition that calls for a very similar action:

Limit the sale of fireworks to those running local council approved events only

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/732559
